definition: to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: You should constantly monitor the cost of development and check for cost overrun.
sentences.chinese: 應該不斷地監視開發的成本以防成本超出預算。

sentences.english: Analyzing them all is beyond the scope of this article.
sentences.chinese: 分析全部擴展超出了本文的範圍。

sentences.english: P29 My instincts were telling me to turn back before things got out of hand.
sentences.chinese: 直覺會在事情超出控制的時候告訴我返回。

sentences.english: Bleed photos off the edge of the page.
sentences.chinese: 出血的照片就可以超出頁邊。

sentences.english: But the events have not caught the team unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 不過此次事件並沒有超出過渡小組的預期。
她的美麗超出了人力所能描繪的限度。

sentences.english: I' try not to exceed my planned budget for this holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我試著不要計畫我的旅行會超出預算。

sentences.english: Now microbes are appearing far outside their environmental niches.
sentences.chinese: 現在微生物遠遠超出了它們的棲身環境。

sentences.english: What is specifically out of scope?
sentences.chinese: 哪些事情是超出範圍的？

sentences.english: He knew he exceeded that. He doubled it.
sentences.chinese: 船長知道船的載貨量已經超出一倍了。

sentences.english: The flower plant has overgrown its support.
sentences.chinese: 盆養花長得極高，超出了支架。

sentences.english: This lozenge has exceeded my expectations.
sentences.chinese: 這個糖丸超出我的預料。

sentences.english: There was also the fear of famine, of uncontrollable weather.
sentences.chinese: 我們同時也害怕鬧饑荒，超出我們控制的天氣變化。

sentences.english: You will feel a need to bring things out into the open, more than ever.
sentences.chinese: 你會感到把事情帶到臺前的需要，超出以往任何時候。

sentences.english: Now teachers rightly feel scape-goated for conditions that are often beyond their control.
sentences.chinese: 現在老師們會覺得無力因爲局勢超出他們的控制範圍。

sentences.english: This trip is out of my budget by a few dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這次旅行經費超出我的預算幾美元。

definition: due to/to stem from/to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc)/to go against (expectations)
